subject: Bulk purchase of Simsonn Pedals
description_text:
Hello,

I've sent an email 48 hours ago and it might got lost since I replied to an
exchange of emails where you mentioned about a 12% discount or higher for
bulk purchases.

We would like to buy 3 sets of 2 Simsonn Plus X Black pedals (Throttle and
Brake) with haptics:
https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-x-pedal-for-racing-simulator?variant=50932387578170

One of the sets is with Baseplate and we would like to have the horizontal
mount for the haptics.

The order would be:

2x - Plus X P2-H2 Black
1x - Plus X P2-H2 Black with Baseplate.

The order will be to ship to Portugal -Lisbon

What would be the best offer you could give us?  How can we proceed with
the order, how long will take to ship and how can we do the payment?

Thanks in advance.

Best regards,
João Oliveira

conversations.body_text: Hi Joao Oliveira,    Alright, our operations colleague will get back to you tomorrow for confirmation, as it’s already 11 p.m. here.

Good morning,

After a good exchange of emails where you replied to all questions I asked,
me and some of my friends decided to go for your pedals, specially because
of your great support.

I'm a bit disappointed that after 5 days I didn't get any reply, specially
since the email was to make an order for your pedals.

I'll wait for today for a reply and then will make a final decision.

Best regards,
João Oliveira

Just to let you know that we order your pedals anyway. Really disappointed

Hope this won't happen in case of needed support.

Best regards,

Hi Joao Oliveira,    We apologize for the delayed response—we've just returned from our 8-day holiday. Our Plus X P2-H2 is currently out of stock at our German warehouse. We'll ship your order once the warehouse restocks in a couple of days. Thank you for your support and patience!

Hello,

I understand that you had an holiday for a week even if I got no reply to
my email that was previously to that week. I also got an email saying that
I would be contacted in the next day, which didn't happened and it would
have been nice to know about the holiday on that contact occasion.

It would also be nice to know that you are currently out of stock. These
are all informations that could be mentioned in the site and would manage
the client expectations.

So I ended up with a smaller discount, a bigger waiting time and all has
already been paid. I'm not sure what "couple" of days really mean. Seems
like you can't give me a specific date for the shipment.

One thing I asked but got no reply. Are the pedals with haptics come with
the new horizontal mount included? Or is it sold separately?

Thanks!

Looking forward to have your pedals.

Best regards,
João Oliveira

A quinta, 9/10/2025, 10:08, support@simsonn.com

Hi Joao Oliveira,    Please don't worry, we will refund the promised 2% discount fee for you. Additionally, we will add an extra horizontal bracket to the tactile device. There has been a delay with our shipment to the German warehouse, but we expect to ship your order within 2-5 days via DHL Express.

Thank you very much! Much appreciated!

Looking forward to have your pedals.

Best regards,
João Oliveira

Hello,

O want to let you know that I've already received my order #SSN2865. I've
yet to test the pedals (and give the sets to my friends) to see that
everything is working but I want to let you know that I've received 2 sets
of 2 pedals and 1 set of 3 pedals (with baseplate) but I had order 3 sets
of 2 pedals, one with Baseplate.

So, you sent me a clutch pedal that I didn't ordered and, of course, didn't
paid for.

Of course I don't mind the extra pedal but wanted to let you know of it and
see if you wanted to take any action regarding it.

Best regards,
João Oliveira
